alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 8:13PM CDT until September 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Archer County in northern Texas... Southern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Millers Creek Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Megargel and Westover. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
